name: Average harmonised learning outcome score (2005-2015) - Altinok, Angrist, and Patrinos (2018)
description: Learning outcomes scores (using the 2018 data vintage) have been discontinued by the authors Angrist et al in favour of the 2021 edition of the HLO Database maintained by the World Bank at: https://datacatalog.worldbank.org/dataset/harmonized-learning-outcomes-hlo-database
source_name: Our World in Data catalog backport
